children.text: The app cannot detect your position. In order to receive earthquake notifications and alarms, click the button below and enable the geolocation. You can choose the battery saving mode, the GPS is not needed.
Why I don't receive the alarm?
Be the first to be notified when a quake is detected real time

(ES) Como configurar la aplicacion: https://youtu.be/OTfvulX_VJo

(ITA) Video di configurazione ed uso youtu.be/0LPWXLII4Ew

Condividi la app con altri per migliorare il rilevamento in tempo reale, grazie.
Press the button below to report an earthquake
Send a message that the other users can read about the earthquake that you reported
